Title: Atanarjuat: The Fast Runner
Writer: Paul Apak Angilirq, Norman Cohn (additional writer), Zacharias Kunuk (additional writer), Herve Paniaq (additional writer), Pauloosie Qulitalik (additional writer)
Actors: Natar Ungalaaq, Sylvia Ivalu, Peter-Henry Arnatsiaq, Lucy Tulugarjuk
Plot: Centuries ago, in what would become the Canadian Arctic, Atuat is promised to the malevolent Oki, son of the leader of their tribe. But Atuat loves the good-natured Atanarjuat, who ultimately finds a way to marry her. Oki's sister, Puja also fancies Atanarjuat, and when she causes strife between him and his brother Amaqjuaq, Oki seizes the opportunity to wreak a terrible revenge on Atanarjuat.
